description: Sangana papuratifomu uye ita zvakawanda neAI yedu inofambiswa nekugadzira maturusi
f_header_desc: Iyo Architects Platform ndeyekutema-kumucheto mhinduro yakagadzirirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko uye kuwedzera kugona kwevagadziri vezvivakwa nevagadziri.
f_content_desc: Ipuratifomu ine simba reAI inopa simba nyanzvi uye vanofarira mundima yezvivakwa uye dhizaini nekupa huwandu hwakasiyana hwezvinhu uye maturusi.
f_tabs_1_desc: Nzvimbo yedu inobatsira vagadziri mukugadzira pfungwa dzekugadzira, kupa mhinduro, uye kupa mazano dzimwe nzira.
f_tabs_2_desc: Tinokubatsira iwe kugadzira mazano ekugadzira, kupa kukurudzira, uye kunatsa magadzirirwo ako ekutanga kuburikidza nemhinduro yekukurukurirana.
f_tabs_3: Market Research Trend Analysis uye Mutengo Estimation
f_tabs_3_desc: Iyo Architects Platform inogadzirisa kuronga kwemari nekubatsira mukugadzira fungidziro yemitengo uye mabhajeti emapurojekiti ekuvaka.
fb_item_1: Yekutanga dhizaini pfungwa uye anokurudzira magadzirirwo
fb_item_1_desc: Chishandiso chacho chinofanira kupa pfungwa yedhizaini yakavakirwa pakuisa kwemugadziri pane zvinodiwa nemutengi uye zvimwe zvinonetsa senge nzvimbo, bhajeti uye zvakare kugadzira ekusimudzira madhizaini.
fb_item_2_desc: Vashandisi vachawana mukana wekuvaka mukugadzira uye kudhizaina maturusi kwavanogona kupa mazano avo kune Architect kuti vawane mhinduro, zano uye kusiyanisa kwedhizaini.
fb_item_3_desc: Iyo Architect inobatsira mukugadzira mukati medzimba uye zvivakwa nekupa madhizaini pamwe nekumisikidzwa kwezvishandiso uye fenicha nekukasira pasina chikonzero chekudhirowa nekupa zvese
fb_item_4: Interior dhizaini chizvarwa uye fenicha generative kuzadza
fb_item_4_desc: Madhirowa akaitwa papuratifomu pamwe chete neakapihwa kubva kuvashandisi semifananidzo anozoitwa mushanduro chaidzo mukati memasekondi.
fb_item_5_desc: Iyo Architect ichabatsira mukugadzira nekugadzirisa dhizaini dzakatogadzirwa pamwe nemifananidzo yakavakirwa pakukurumidza uye inopawo zano uye mutsauko wedhizaini
fb_item_6: Market Research Analysis uye Mutengo weKufungidzira
fb_item_6_desc: Zvichienderana nedhizaini uye zvinodikanwa zvipingamupinyi Iyo Architect inobatsira nekuongorora zvidikanwi zvekugadzira uye kufungidzira mutengo wekuvaka uye inopa mhinduro dzinokwanisika.
h_header_desc: AI-powered platform inobatsira uye inopa simba nyanzvi nevanofarira mumunda wezvivakwa nedhizaini nekupa huwandu hwakasiyana hwezvinhu uye maturusi.
mb_header_desc: Gara uchiziva, dhizaini uye fambisa basa kumberi neThe Architects paIOS & Android. Dhawunirodha app nhasi.
pr_header_desc: Pano paInnovate Fusion tinotarisa kune vanovaka uko tekinoroji, hunyanzvi, uye capital inogona kuvhura kukosha kwenguva refu uye kusimudzira hupfumi.
r_header_desc: Isa email address yawakashandisa pawakasaina account yako, uye tichakutumira email yekuseta patsva password.
s_welcome: Welcome back. We exist to make
